channel.title: The history of private servers and the debate of their legality
channel.description:
At the dawn of rsps, we were actually illeagal (hint the shutting down of frugooscape). But as timed passed, and the original rsps became what label as a 194 server became history. we developed another source, the 317. These numbers label the client cache that you download from the original RuneScape website. This source has been manipulated into our OWN version of "RuneScape". This version is completely made by us, and ever since we have OWNED rsps.
A quote from a server's site I decided to lol at today. Are you all this misinformed?

item.title: The history of private servers and the debate of their legality
item.dc:creator: @_bool
item.description:
@_bool wrote:

rain1994:

I am just very happy that rsps came out, it saved the game

fosho bro thats how it go

item.title: The history of private servers and the debate of their legality
item.dc:creator: @_bool
item.description:
@_bool wrote:

[quote=“Javafire, post:26, topic:346818”][quote author=(Anthony) link=topic=443197.msg3260280#msg3260280 date=1278444377]

At the dawn of rsps, we were actually illeagal (hint the shutting down of frugooscape). But as timed passed, and the original rsps became what label as a 194 server became history. we developed another source, the 317. These numbers label the client cache that you download from the original RuneScape website. This source has been manipulated into our OWN version of “RuneScape”. This version is completely made by us, and ever since we have OWNED rsps.

A quote from a server’s site I decided to lol at today.
Are you all this misinformed?

ugh, this was on my page right? that was from an old site of mine and i haven’t updated it since asscrack. Quit posting shit that’s none of your buisness

oh and by the way you aren’t allowed to post this, everything on my site is strictly forbidden to be reused on another without my permission.

but i permit you to lol untill i update the site

This is the link to what this page is refering to

this was unofficial writing and i have no idea how the page is out right now, i thought i just had the forums connected. so much for the shit.

hey, you’re a fucking tard and what the fuck are you gonna do sue me for quoting your website? gl with that one bro.
ps ur site sucks, thanks.
[/quote]
um, no i was just saying it’s confedential, and plus i didn’t write it, i let my brothers write an essay for my site and use it for my new webpage, but i wasn’t gonna post it untill i moved the site and even looked at it idk how this is on right now.[/quote]
MY SITE CONFIDENTIAL BRO ITS TOTALLY NOT OPEN FOR EVERYONE TO SEE, I PUT RETARDED STATEMENTS UP THEN BLAME ON MY BROTHER.

Read full topic

[/quote]
the first public one was unless he had one long before he released his.
there were other private simple emulators.
ps winterlove is a person.[/quote]
cuz it was in c++, once all the noobs swarmed in he quickly ported it to java.
